description: Teriyaki cauliflower rice bowls, made with sweet and tender teriyaki-glazed sweet potatoes, stovetop cauliflower rice, fresh avocado, and edamame. A lovely Asian-inspired, vegan and gluten-free lunch bowl!
name: Teriyaki Cauliflower Rice Bowls
recipeIngredient: 1 head of cauliflower (leaves and tough stems removed, roughly chopped)
1/2 inch ginger root (peeled and minced or grated)
2 cups shelled cooked edamame (I used frozen & thawed)
2 cups cooked corn kernels (optional) (I used frozen & thawed fire-roasted corn)

recipeInstructions.text: Make cauliflower rice according to these instructions, with one modification: saute the garlic and ginger in the oil first until soft, before adding the cauliflower.
